title: SET_BLIP_FLASH_TIMER
content:
0xD3CD6FD297AE87CC0x8D5DF611// SetBlipFlashTimer
void SET_BLIP_FLASH_TIMER(Blip blip, int duration);Parameters:blip: The blip to start flashingduration: Time in milliseconds to flash the blip before stoppingFlashes blip for time in milliseconds before stopping.Examples:LuaJavaScriptlocal blip = AddBlipForCoord(0, 0, 0)

-- flash blip for seven seconds then stop
SetBlipFlashTimer(blip, 7000)
codeBlocks:
// SetBlipFlashTimer
void SET_BLIP_FLASH_TIMER(Blip blip, int duration);

local blip = AddBlipForCoord(0, 0, 0)

-- flash blip for seven seconds then stop
SetBlipFlashTimer(blip, 7000)
